channel.title: [562]Need help with welcome message
channel.description:
I thought the welcome message should be in actionsender, but it is not, I have also searched for all "corruptionX" in the src and found nothing that will change it. I have done a lot of work on this server, and I am hoping I dont have to give up because I can't find this. -.-
Thanks to anyone that can help

item.title: [562]Need help with welcome message
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:3, topic:391474”]if i were you do not try and mess with a 562 they are complicated unless you can accually make one
now id stick with 317 or 508
but id say only coders should be the server holders and maybe end up teaching others
not giving out sources

now for your question…
i havent worked with a 562 but i think try client.java on both client and source and see if you can find the message[/quote]

^this

I don’t work with 562’s either but 90% of the time that’s where you will find it in a 317

Read full topic
